translation: Whatever obligatory action is done, O Arjuna, merely because it ought to be done, abandoning attachment and also the desire for reward, that renunciation is regarded as sattvic (pure).
commentary: 18.9 Work ought to be done? It is thus? Eve even? that which? Karma action? fixed obligatory? is performed is performed? Arjuna Or Arjuna? Sangam attachment? Leaving abandoning? fruit fruit? f and? Eve even? He's that? Renunciation: abandonment? Sattvic: Sattvic (pure)? Matah is regarded.Commentary A man of pure nature performs actions that have fallen to his lot in accordance with his capacity and his inherent nature.
